answers.answer: Congratulations momma and will keep your baby boy in my prayers
Congratulations praying for u and your family
Congratulations on your bundle of joy. I will keep you both in my prayers.
congratulations to you and keeping you and your baby boy in prayer
Congratulations.  Will keep both you and your baby in prayers ♥
Congratulations your storey brought tears to my eyes god bless you and your family your in my prayers
thank you very much to everyone. much love and blessings your way from my babyboy and myself!! <3
Congratulations you're both in my thoughts & prayers < 3
Happy Birthday lil One we share a birthday
Congratulations, and we are all praying for you both to get through this.
Congratulations! & i bet he will be a fighter just like mommy sending prayers to both of you!
Congratulations and prayers to you and your little one!

question: I can truly just say how blessed i am to given birth to my beautiful baby boy, hes 1 pound and 14oz. 13 inches long at only 26 weeks, due to my preeclampsia. i am only 19 years old. And alone in this world. Baby daddy was with me but it was like if i was still alone. But its okay, i got really bad on the edge of a stroke and seizure and they rushed me into an emergency c-section. I just knew i had to fight for him. And i did. and hes perfectlt fine. Hell be in INCU for three months or so but i know he'll get the care he deserves! & well to my blood pressure hopefully they can finally get it under control. <3 i just please ask, to keep my son and i in your prayers. Because i  i had him one day to another. Anything can happen one day to another also. Lets pray and hope for the best! #Thankyou
title: Gave birth Nov 11 @ 12:22 am to a 26 week old baby boy!!
